quotes.title: Under the Night
quotes.quote: If the Commonwealth's High Guard had a weakness, it was this: Its officers were too competent, too caring, and too brave.
quotes.name: Yin Man-Wei
quotes.source: The Rise and Fall of the Systems Commonwealth

quotes.title: An Affirming Flame
quotes.quote: Some say the Commonwealth would have fallen even without Nietzschean treachery.  They underestimate both the Commonwealth and the Nietzscheans in a single breath.
quotes.name: Yin Man-Wei
quotes.source: The Rise and Fall of the Systems Commonwealth

quotes.title: To Loose the Fateful Lightning
quotes.quote: Those who fail to learn history are doomed to repeat it; those who fail to learn history correctly-- why they are simply doomed.
quotes.name: Achem Dro'hm

quotes.title: D Minus Zero
quotes.quote: Here's everything I know about war: Somebody wins, somebody loses, and nothing is ever the same again.
quotes.name: Admiral Constanza Stark

quotes.title: Double Helix
quotes.quote: Machiavelli's ideas are basically sound ones for the Nietzschean People.  Unfortunately, he was an optimist.
quotes.name: Cerebus Khmer

quotes.title: Angel Dark, Demon Bright
quotes.quote: The Heavens burned, the stars cried out And under the ashes of infinity, Hope, scarred and bleeding, breathed its last.
quotes.name: Ulatempa Poetess

quotes.title: The Ties that Blind
quotes.quote: Many say living in the Way is difficult. Is sleeping difficult? Is waking?
quotes.name: Serentity Vikram Singh Khalsa

quotes.title: The Banks of the Lethe
quotes.quote: We say atoms are bound by Weak Attractions.  Why not admit the Truth: The Universe is held together by Love.
quotes.name: Michio Von Kerr

quotes.title: A Rose in the Ashes
quotes.quote: The truest measure of a society is how it treats its elderly, its pets, and its prisoners.
quotes.name: Keeper of the Way

quotes.title: All Great Neptune's Ocean
quotes.quote: Democracy may only be a few steps removed from anarchy, but at least it's not as loud.
quotes.name: Crowned in Starlight Than Hegemon

quotes.title: The Pearls that Were His Eyes
quotes.quote: Wealth is too precious to be entrusted to the rich.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.title: The Mathematics of Tears
quotes.quote: If hope is the engine of the soul, Then duty is the navigator... And love is the fuel.
quotes.name: High Guard Supreme Commander Sani nax Rifati

quotes.title: Music of a Distant Drum
quotes.quote: KLUDGE (Klooj) - N. Disparaging term for genetically unmodified human being
quotes.source: A Concise Dictionary of Slang and Euphemism

quotes.title: Harper 2.0
quotes.quote: One head cannot contain all Wisdom.
quotes.name: The Olduvai Cycle

quotes.title: Forced Perspective
quotes.quote: Humans say the Road to Hell is paved with good intentions.  Why? Do they think there's a shortage of bad ones?
quotes.name: Karm'Luk P'an Ku

quotes.title: The Sum of Its Parts
quotes.quote: Between birth and death lies desire, Desire for life, for love, for everything good.  And this is the source of all suffering.

quotes.title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
quotes.quote: Warning: Do Not Operate Heavy Machinery or Navigate The Slipstream While Under the Influence Of This Beverage.

quotes.title: The Devil Take the Hindmost
quotes.quote: Only those born guilty Recognize Innocence for what it Is: The rarest thing in the Universe, And the most Precious
quotes.source: The Anointed, The Finder of The Way,

quotes.title: The Honey Offering
quotes.quote: The enemy of my enemy is still my enemy.
quotes.name: Drago Museveni

quotes.title: Star-Crossed
quotes.quote: You ask why we give our Ships' Computers normal Emotions? Do you really want a Warship Incapable of Loyalty? Or of love?
quotes.name: The Unshattered Allegiance, High Guard Frigate

quotes.title: It Makes a Lovely Light
quotes.quote: Come bitter Rain, And wash from my Heart That saddest of all Words: Home
quotes.name: Ulatempa Poetess

quotes.title: Its Hour Come 'Round at Last
quotes.quote: Screams of a billion murdered Stars Give lie to the night's Peace, While we cling in desperation to the Few Fragile spinning stones we call Worlds.
quotes.name: Wayfinder First Order Hasturi aka 'The Mad Perseid'
